column1: Art Institute of Chicago////If you're into this place as much as I am
column2: the memberships offer a lot of great stuff too. As a student
column3: I was able to become a member for only $40
column4: giving me free admission (and a free guest entry)
column5: 10% off the cafe and gift shop
column6: access to the member lounge where coffee is totally free
column7: first dibs on entry into new exhibits
column8: a subscription to the institute magazine
column9: and a free two-pocketed member tote bag that is my new man-bag of choice. I can't recommend enough a membership at the Institute.
